department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: List of dental laboratory services provided by a third party contractor for prisons and correctional services.
full_summary:
## Request for Standing Offer Dental Laboratory Services

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4129444734-Doc4328491037
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4129444734
* **Publication Date**: December 4, 2023
* ** Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2024 at 14:00 (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 30, 2024

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a 5-year standing offer for dental laboratory services. The services will be provided to Correctional Service of Canada (CSC).

### Tender Conditions

* This is a competitive procurement with an open bidding process.
* Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
* Only timely bid submissions will be considered.
* Please note that bid submissions received after the closing time will be declared non-responsive.

### Contracting Entity and End User Entities

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **End User Entities**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
*   **Address**: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 0P9, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Aleksandra Karpik, PSPC
*   **Email**: aleksandra.karpik@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: [Not Provided]

### Procurement Documents

* Please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18157381?extsite=MTgxNTczODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18157381?extsite=MTgxNTczODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for more information.
